resources.string: Facebook App, Sync Frequency, Resource Saving
Contact Matching, Status Updates, Image Cropping
Will sync events you\'re attending to a separate Calendar if checked.
Only sync contacts already on device.
Useful for contacts where Facebook and Phone names differ.
These friends will be synced even if they don\'t match any contacts on your device.
Strongly recommended. Needs Android 4.0.3 or higher.
Uses face detection to determine the optimal area.
Only sync when in a Wi-Fi network.
Want more fine-tuned configuration?\nCheck out the advanced settings!
Syncs your own Facebook-info with Android\'s \"Me\" Contact.
Shows the contact\'s full timeline, also containing posts from other users.

Adds HTCData tags to your Google Contacts. Useful when switching roms/wiping your phone.
This will overwrite the \"Notes\"-Field in your Google Contacts. Are you sure you want to continue?
Only create birthday events for contacts also on phone.
Forces redownload of all contact images on next sync.
Only sync events with selected RSVP statuses.
Install to prevent losing data on reboot.
Not linked to any Google Contact
Synchronize birthdays directly into the contact. NOTE: This is separate from birthday calendar sync.
Adds \"username@facebook.com\" emails to contacts (Facebook doesn\'t permit access to other addresses). Required for contact links in Event Attendees.
Please wait for HaxSync to finish sync.
Be careful, if you don\'t install the workaround, your HaxSync data will be gone after a reboot. Only continue if you have taken precautions of your own and know what you\'re doing.
Due to a bug in Android/Google Play, the HaxSync-Account gets deleted after a reboot. To prevent this from happening, please install my free Workaround-App.
Manually sync contacts, edit contact links and crop images!
Get the latest updates on new features here. Something not working like it should? Check the Facebook page, chances are it\'s a known issue; the Facebook page will keep you informed.
Experiencing problems? Or do you have an idea for a great new feature? Report it here! NOTE: I cannot answer ratings in the Play Store, so bad ratings will not help fix your issue.
Overwrites photos stored in Google Contacts with those of merged HaxSync contacts.
First, we need to authorize HaxSync with Facebook.
To do this, we need you to login to your Facebook account.
Now we just need to decide what to sync.
Your Android version has a bug which negatively affects HaxSync.
Please install the free workaround to prevent this from happening.
Thanks for setting up HaxSync.\nYour content is syncing now.
If at any time you want to edit your settings or want more control over HaxSync\'s behavior, go to "Accounts" in "Settings" and select your HaxSync account.
You already have some custom HaxSync settings set.
The next step might overwrite some of your custom config.
Touch the HaxSync logo to begin
App to open profiles, status updates and photos
Contacts with multiple picture sources will use HaxSync.
Ignores middle names and titles (e.g. Dr.) from Facebook friends
Sync "Me" contact with my contact entry
If you have yourself saved as contact
